works.description:
Dear Sir/Madam,

  We at Jobs.ps Ltd  ,the leading online recruitment Palestinian company
in  
Palestine ,we are a registered company under the number 562479543 in  
2008 ,in the Ministry of economy and commerece in Ramallah,Palestine.
-------------------------
we noticed that the below site (Blog) is repeating copying job posts
from jobs.ps without permission from us ,we asked him to mention the
source
of his posts which is Jobs.ps ,but unfortunately he refused to do that
.also   we submitted a request to google team and they deleted the posts
as  
indicated in these requests #1045211543, #1027343011  these posts are  
belongs to our customer -employers-who have membership on Jobs.ps and we  

have the right on their  content as we have contracts with employers .

How this affects us:
as a service provider we received many complaints from our customers
that this site  is posting posts and send unrelated applications to  
employers emails ,in addition,this affected our search ranking on
google.om  
and  google.ps as we highly depend on our content to drive traffic to   
jobs.ps from google search engine.he is using blogspot as free tool to  
copy  our content and benefiting from google adsense at no cost ,while we 

have high operational cost to keep our job board online.
we contact the owner of the website  http://foru ps.blogspot.com,through  

his email forus.ps@gmail.com ,and called him via his mobile number  
00970599352355 many times and asked him not copy job posts from  jobs.ps  

and explained to him the damage this action is causing to us also the  
unethical action he is doing ,but he refused to respond and he continued  

copying  contents from jobs.ps , we at Jobs.ps sincerely ask google
company  
to take the right action and solve this issue as he is using google  
products and services (blogger,google adsense ,google search engine) to  
destroy our business  .
Please note that the below posts are samples but he is copying everything 

on jobs.ps .

P.S: We at jobs.ps are ready to provide you with any document you ask
and need that proofs that we are the owner of this content

Amjad Hamarsheh
Jobs.ps ,Director
Ramallah,Palestine
Mobile: +970 599 358 274
